_____’s large nostrils are specialized for spraying sand, so this Pokémon is not very good at telling apart different smells.
_____’s neck pouch, which can inflate and deflate like a balloon, gets more elastic each time _____ sheds its skin.
It spews sand from its nostrils. While the enemy is blinded, it burrows into the ground to hide.
As it digs, it swallows sand and stores it in its neck pouch. The pouch can hold more than 17 pounds of sand.
